name: millimole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of measurement equal to one thousandth of a mole (= a measure of the amount of a substance): My cholesterol count is 2.8 millimoles per litre. Blood glucose test results displayed in milligrams are 18 times higher than those expressed in millimoles.
More examplesFewer examplesTaxi drivers were found to have the highest cholesterol levels on average - 5.7 millimoles per litre of blood.Doctors found his sodium level was 184 millimoles per litre, compared with the normal 140.The naturally occurring carbon dioxide level of the average horse is around 31 millimoles per litre.
